title: Your client, is TERRIBLE.
body: I really cannot put to words how frustrated I have been these past few months playing this game, the amount of time my game freezes ( Happens on no other game apart from low, even on the lowest settings my PC gets FPS spikes EVERY game sometimes costing me games!) But now recently my client is crashing in champ select, it started off as 30 min queue timers which I thought really was the limit, but after getting level 30 on my account and placing in my promos, I just lost 10 lp for d/c;ing in champ select, riot there has to be other ways round these stupid aggravating ways that you punish your players, lack of thought!{{champion:105}} {{champion:17}}

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing two separate issues here. First, we'll focus on the more emergent of the two- your disconnections from champ select. Most issues in champ select are caused by drops in your connection to the matchmaking service since champ select heavily relies on a really steady connection, especially in any sort of draft mode. 

Incompatible network settings that prevent a good link from happening are the most common cause of issues such as this, so I encourage you to work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in resolving this problem.

Let me know if that guide provided any noticeable results.
